resource.descriptor: Form: (Module Visit History) - Treatment complete for this visit
Form: (Module Visit History) - TEST LOAD FORM [fra]
Form: (Module Tablet User Management) - Add Tablet User
Form: (Module Tablet User Management) - Modify Tablet User Details
Form: (Module Tablet User Management) - Remove Tablet User

xpath.function: if(today() - date(dob) > 30, concat(case_name, ' (', int((today() - date(dob)) div 30.25), ' Mois)'), concat(case_name, ' (',int(today() - date(dob)), ' Jours)'))
if(today() - date(dob) > 30, concat(case_name, ' (', int((today() - date(dob)) div 30.25), ' Mois)'), concat(case_name, ' (',int(today() - date(dob)), ' Jours)'))

if(classification_malnutrition = 'pas_malnutrition', $kpas_malnutrition, if(classification_malnutrition = 'mam', $kmam, if(classification_malnutrition = 'mass', $kmass, if(classification_malnutrition = 'masc', $kmasc, if(classification_malnutrition = 'incapable_nourrir', $kincapable_nourrir, if(classification_malnutrition = 'probleme_alimentation', $kprobleme_alimentation, if(classification_malnutrition = 'pas_pb_alimentation', $kpas_pb_alimentation, if(classification_malnutrition = 'maladie_grave', $kmaladie_grave, if(classification_malnutrition = 'pas_de_probleme_alimentation', $kpas_de_probleme_alimentation, '')))))))))

if(classification_vih = 'vih_pas', $kvih_pas, if(classification_vih = 'vih_peu_probable', $kvih_peu_probable, if(classification_vih = 'vih_symp_suspecte', $kvih_symp_suspecte, if(classification_vih = 'vih_possible', $kvih_possible, if(classification_vih = 'vih_symp_probable', $kvih_symp_probable, if(classification_vih = 'vih_confirmee', $kvih_confirmee, if(classification_vih = 'vih_symp_confirmee', $kvih_symp_confirmee, if(classification_vih = 'vih_asymp_confirmee', $kvih_asymp_confirmee, if(classification_vih = 'vih_pas_infection', $kvih_pas_infection, if(classification_vih = 'vih_probable', $kvih_probable, ''))))))))))

if(qualification = 'ide', $kide, if(qualification = 'ib', $kib, if(qualification = 'ab', $kab, if(qualification = 'accoucheuse', $kaccoucheuse, if(qualification = 'fe_me', $kfe_me, if(qualification = 'ais', $kais, if(qualification = 'other', $kother, '')))))))
